About Me

On a personal level, I am Romanian born, curious and energetic, ex-professional athlete with Physical Therapy University, 3 years experience. I moved in Amsterdam 2 years ago, with my girlfriend as a massage therapist where I discovered Ubiqum bootcamp as a result of my continuous curiosity about technology since I was a teenager.

Following the full-time coding bootcamp, with "Learn by doing" methodology based on structured framework like Scrum and Agile methodology I learned how to architect dynamic web sites, that meet project goals, user needs and industry standards within a clean and structured code.

It  came to realize that I truly enjoy coding, developing user friendly applications, programming field becoming a true passion of mine as I’ve been always intrigued how technology influences the quality of life. To grow my knowledge base, I actively seek out new technologies and stay up-to-date on industry trends and advancements.
